channel.title: Hamatchi
channel.description: [u][b]dose any 1 know any Hamatchi network names and passwords[/b][/u]

item.title: Hamatchi
item.dc:creator: @LeRoyHdes LeRoyHdes
item.description:
@LeRoyHdes wrote:

Look, i couldn’t port forward because the type of router i have… or something. These ppl have a choice, so it’s up to them, you have your opinion and i have mine. This is getting off topic as he is wondering what Hamachi is, he isn’t wanting to know if it’s “gay” or just a plain waste of time. It’s an alternative, dont like it? dont use it or post about it. Nobody cares about what you have to say about Hamachi unless it’s usefull information on it, if you truely are passionate about how much you hate Hamachi, make a rants post about it… mabe somone who cares will post with you.

NOTE: This was an alternative for people who can’t port forward, and have done everything to try this. Or maybe there are some lazy ppl out there, is it really that bad? jeez! It’s also great for contact if server is laggy. Use your imagination… You do know you can talk on it kinda like a downgraded MSN.

Read full topic

item.title: Hamatchi
item.dc:creator: @LeRoyHdes LeRoyHdes
item.description:
@LeRoyHdes wrote:

Hamachi is a digital portal for players who can’t port forward, it’s not “gay” im guessing you dont know what gay means because im sure a computer program can’t me homosexual. Anyway’s i am the person who came up for the idea, and it worked. Just a suggestion (DONT USE HAMACH UNLESS YOU ARE HAVING TROUBLE PORT FORWARDING). if there are any requests for Hamachi, i’ll post a tut and a link to download it.
